title: The Last Stand: Custer, Sitting Bull, and the Battle of the Little Bighorn
description: In this riveting narrative, celebrated historian Nathaniel Philbrick reveals Custer and Sitting Bull as never before, creating an unforgettable portrait of two leaders as they embarked on a collision course that reached its violent climax on a lonely rise now known as Last Stand Hill.
author: Nathaniel Philbrick
